org.magelan.core.entity
Class LabelEntity

java.lang.Object
  org.magelan.core.DefaultEntity
      org.magelan.core.entity.TextEntity
          org.magelan.core.entity.LabelEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Entity, RotatableEntity, DrawingElement
public class LabelEntity
extends TextEntity

A label used to display the properties of another entity.

Constructor Detail

LabelEntity

public LabelEntity()
Creates a default label.

LabelEntity

public LabelEntity(Entity entity,
                   int idx,
                   double dx,
                   double dy,
                   java.lang.String name)
Creates a label, attached to an entity. It will be displayed at coordinates (dx;dy) relative to the modifier at index idx of the parent entity. The label will display the property with specified name.

Parameters:
entity - entity to attach the label to
idx - modifier index
dx - initial coordinate
dy - initial coordinate
name - property name to display
See Also:
Entity, EntityModifier

LabelEntity

public LabelEntity(Entity entity,
                   int idx,
                   java.lang.String name)
Creates a new LabelEntity object.

Parameters:
entity - entity to attach the label to
idx - modifier index
name - property name to display
